name: Large Creature Test
description: Test module for large creature dice tier modifications

options.name: Size Advantage
options.description: Your large size grants advantages in some physical tasks but makes you clumsier in others

options.name: Physical Prowess
options.description: Your size grants enhanced physical capabilities

options.name: Bulk
options.description: Your large frame makes you slower and less agile

options.name: Enhanced Strength
options.description: Your size grants incredible physical might

options.name: Coordination Penalty
options.description: Your large size makes precise movements difficult

options.name: Intimidating Presence
options.description: Your size makes you naturally more intimidating

options.name: Final Advantage
options.description: The culmination of your size advantages
